game.name: The Symbiant Re:Union
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 심비언트 애프터 스토리를 통해 단야와 브레이브 간의 열정과 로맨스에 흠뻑 빠져 보세요. 애프터 스토리의 이야기는 본 게임의 두 엔딩 이후를 다루고 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take a deep dive into Danya’s and Brahve’s heat and romance in The Symbiant Re:Union. The events take place after two Endings of The Symbiant’s main game.

reviewHighlights.text: ⚠️ Content Warning The Cayama route needs a trigger warning. In Scene 3, one character physically blocks a doorway and refuses to let the other leave...
I need more, I love these characters so much. I also really liked how you could play both outcomes depending on the endings in the first game.
